pros: Such a rewarding place to work - really helping transform lives in cities in the global south
cons: Nothing that I can think of

review_title: Great group of people to work with, inspiring and fun
pros: Inspiring team with a huge amount of ambition. Very knowledgeable, astute and caring people. The org pushes against the Charity approach with a business mind and business outlook without losing its core focus of support for the urban poor.
cons: As with any company in the non-profit sector, available funding is an obstacle to ambition.
